data.title: All-Inclusive Resorts in Ocho Rios Jamaica
data.meta_description: Escape to tropical bliss! The best Caribbean vacation package at Couples Tower Isle in Jamaica. Swim-up bar & private balconies with ocean views. Book now!
data.text: Book now through September 30, 2024 and travel now - December 24, 2024. Valid for new bookings only. Special rates are based on stays of 6-nights or more at Couples Tower Isle (from $195 per person per night). Featured offer varies by resort, room category, travel dates and availability. Resort credits may be applied to room category upgrades (subject to availability), spa and salon services, private dinners, photos and photo packages from resort photographers, telephone charges dialed from room, general managerâ€™s special wine list, night snorkeling, gift shop or romance packages. Applicable to US & Canadian Residents Only. Offer is subject to closeouts and availability and cannot be combined with any other promotional offers outside of this promotion or substituted for similar value products or services. This offer has no cash value. Couples Resorts reserves the right to change or cancel the offer at any time. *Catamaran Cruise not available at Couples Sans Souci. Price match requirements and exclusions are as follows: Rates must be current and publicly available for verification. This guarantee does not apply to screenshots or other similarly produced images. The following will not be accepted: rates on "opaque" websites where the hotel brand and specific hotel are not known until the booking is made (E.G., Priceline, Hotwire.com), packaged rates that include air, car rentals, taxes, service charges, meals, coupons, parking, services, or other services and amenities, qualified discount rates including, but not limited to, Government, AAA or Senior Citizen Discounts, unpublished, negotiated with corporations, travel agencies, groups, associations or other rates that are specifically agreed upon by our hotel and a specified and limited group, and are not publicly available such as employee, offline wholesale/FIT, pre-paid rates which may include a voucher (including electronic vouchers), group or other specially negotiated rates, reservations made within 24 hours of arrival, taxes, gratuities, service charges, early departure fees, or other fees and incidental charges, rate disparities due to fluctuations, rounding, or differences in the currency exchange rates.
